pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa upaṭṭhāko mahāmatto āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa dūtena cīvaracetāpannaṃ pāhesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.3: “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā ayyaṃ upanandaṃ cīvarena acchādehī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.4: Atha kho so dūto yenāyasmā upanando sakyaputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.5: “idaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmantaṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.7: Evaṃ vutte āyasmā upanando sakyaputto taṃ dūtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.8: “na kho mayaṃ, āvuso, cīvaracetāpannaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma, cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma kālena kappiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.9: Evaṃ vutte, so dūto āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.11: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro upāsako ārāmaṃ agamāsi kenacideva karaṇīyena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.12: Atha kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto taṃ dūtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.14: Atha kho so dūto taṃ upāsakaṃ saññāpetvā yenāyasmā upanando sakyaputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.15: “yaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmā veyyāvaccakaraṃ niddisi saññatto so mayā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.16: Upasaṅkamatu āyasmā kālena, cīvarena taṃ acchādessatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.17: Tena kho pana samayena so mahāmatto āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa santike dūtaṃ pāhesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.18: “paribhuñjatu ayyo taṃ cīvaraṃ, icchāma mayaṃ ayyena taṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuttan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.19: Atha kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto taṃ upāsakaṃ na kiñci avacāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.20: Dutiyampi kho so mahāmatto āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa santike dūtaṃ pāhesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.21: “paribhuñjatu ayyo taṃ cīvaraṃ, icchāma mayaṃ ayyena taṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuttan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.22: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto taṃ upāsakaṃ na kiñci avacāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.23: Tatiyampi kho so mahāmatto āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa santike dūtaṃ pāhesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.24: “paribhuñjatu ayyo taṃ cīvaraṃ, icchāma mayaṃ ayyena taṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuttan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena negamassa samayo hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.2: Negamena ca katikā katā hoti— “yo pacchā āgacchati paññāsaṃ baddho”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.3: Atha kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto yena so upāsako tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ upāsakaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.6: Negamena ca katikā katā hoti—‘yo pacchā āgacchati paññāsaṃ baddho’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.7: “Ajjeva me, āvuso, cīvaraṃ dehī”ti ovaṭṭikāya parāmasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.8: Atha kho so upāsako āyasmatā upanandena sakyaputtena nippīḷiyamāno āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā pacchā agamāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.10: “kissa tvaṃ, ayyo, pacchā āgato, paññāsaṃ jīnosī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.11: Atha kho so upāsako tesaṃ manussānaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.17: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.18: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.21: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.29: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.1: “Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissa rājā vā rājabhoggo vā brāhmaṇo vā gahapatiko vā dūtena cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.2: ‘iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarena acchādehī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.3: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.4: ‘idaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmantaṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ, paṭiggaṇhātu āyasmā cīvaracetāpannan’ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.5: tena bhikkhunā so dūto evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.6: ‘na kho mayaṃ, āvuso, cīvaracetāpannaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma. Cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma, kālena kappiyan’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.7: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.9: cīvaratthikena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo ārāmiko vā upāsako vā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.11: So ce dūto taṃ veyyāvaccakaraṃ saññāpetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.12: ‘yaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmā veyyāvaccakaraṃ niddisi saññatto so mayā, upasaṅkamatu āyasmā kālena, cīvarena taṃ acchādessatī’ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.13: cīvaratthikena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro upasaṅkamitvā dvattikkhattuṃ codetabbo sāretabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.15: Dvattikkhattuṃ codayamāno sārayamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.16: no ce abhinipphādeyya, catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūtena uddissa ṭhātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.17: Catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūto uddissa tiṭṭhamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.18: tato ce uttari vāyamamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.19: No ce abhinipphādeyya, yatassa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ, tattha sāmaṃ vā gantabbaṃ dūto vā pāhetabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.20: ‘yaṃ kho tumhe āyasmanto bhikkhuṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇittha, na taṃ tassa bhikkhuno kiñci atthaṃ anubhoti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.21: yuñjantāyasmanto sakaṃ, mā vo sakaṃ vinassā’ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.2: bhikkhussatthāya, bhikkhuṃ ārammaṇaṃ karitvā, bhikkhuṃ acchādetukāmo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.10: ṭhapetvā rājaṃ rājabhoggaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ avaseso gahapatiko nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.12: hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā muttā vā maṇi vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.19: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.20: “idaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmantaṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ. Paṭiggaṇhātu āyasmā cīvaracetāpannan”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.21: tena bhikkhunā so dūto evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.22: “na kho mayaṃ, āvuso, cīvaracetāpannaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma. Cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma, kālena kappiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.23: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.25: Cīvaratthikena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo ārāmiko vā upāsako vā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.27: Na vattabbo— “tassa dehīti vā, so vā nikkhipissati, so vā parivattessati, so vā cetāpessatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.28: So ce dūto taṃ veyyāvaccakaraṃ saññāpetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.29: “yaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmā veyyāvaccakaraṃ niddisi saññatto so mayā. Upasaṅkamatu āyasmā kālena, cīvarena taṃ acchādessatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.30: Cīvaratthikena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro upasaṅkamitvā dvattikkhattuṃ codetabbo sāretabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.32: Na vattabbo— “dehi me cīvaraṃ, āhara me cīvaraṃ, parivattehi me cīvaraṃ, cetāpehi me cīvaran”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.36: no ce abhinipphādeti, tattha gantvā tuṇhībhūtena uddissa ṭhātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.37: Na āsane nisīditabbaṃ. Na āmisaṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.40: Sace āsane vā nisīdati, āmisaṃ vā paṭiggaṇhāti, dhammaṃ vā bhāsati, ṭhānaṃ bhañjati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.2.1: Tato ce uttari vāyamamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.2.4: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.2.7: “idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ atirekatikkhattuṃ codanāya atirekachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena abhinipphāditaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.2.12: No ce abhinipphādeyya, yatassa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ tattha sāmaṃ vā gantabbaṃ dūto vā pāhetabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.2.13: “yaṃ kho tumhe, āyasmanto, bhikkhuṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇittha na taṃ tassa bhikkhuno kiñci atthaṃ anubhoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.2.14: Yuñjantāyasmanto sakaṃ, mā vo sakaṃ vinassā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.3.1: Atirekatikkhattuṃ codanāya atirekachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena atirekasaññī abhinipphādeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.3.2: Atirekatikkhattuṃ codanāya atirekachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena vematiko abhinipphādeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.3.3: Atirekatikkhattuṃ codanāya atirekachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena ūnakasaññī abhinipphādeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.3.4: Ūnakatikkhattuṃ codanāya ūnakachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena atirekasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.3.5: Ūnakatikkhattuṃ codanāya ūnakachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.3.6: Ūnakatikkhattuṃ codanāya ūnakachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena ūnakasaññī anāpatti.
